Please find information regarding data extracted for each species and data file formats

## Input file formats

All pdf files should have the same format.

YEAR_SPECIESNAME_LOCATION_REPORTNAME.pdf (Note: 3 underscores) 

eg. 2017_mackerel_GOM-GB-MA_18-06.pdf



* LOCATION defines the location where SPECIESNAME is harvested/sampled (eg, GB, GOM, EastGB, GB-GOM, etc).
Use hyphens to separate acronyms/words in LOCATION

* REPORTNAME defines the source report of the pdf.

Do not use additional underscores. Underscores will be used to split the pdf name if necessary.




## Mackerel

Biomass and Catch extracted

## Herring 

Biomass and landings extracted

Discards partially extracted (Table has unusual format. Requires manual data entry)
